author: noel
msg: 2. Add "FromRepository" mail attribute to make it easy to detect messages that have been spool from a repository.  THIS IS AN EXPERIMENTAL CHANGE.  Both the attribute name and the value should probably change.  Possibly the latter should be a URI for the repository or the message.
